      • getSSLContext

        public SSLContext getSSLContext()
                         throws SecurityProviderException
        Description copied from class: SecurityProvider
        Retrieves the SSL context loaded with trusted certs. In case of X509 SSL context shall be loaded with complete chain all the way till the leaf along with its private key.
        Specified by:
        getSSLContext in class SecurityProvider
        Returns:
        The SSLContext relevant to the flow
        Throws:
        SecurityProviderException - If ssl context could not be generated for any of the reason
